731271f-a.title: Celebrations - Parades.
731271f-a.text:
New York went mad over its own Trudy as it turned out to welcome
her when she arrived todsy on the S.S. Berengaria, The mobs
becano so demonstrative and enthusiaskic over the champion
channel swimmwr that they completely choked up Broadway
and for some tims "Trudy' was unable to proceed on up to City
Hall. Photo shows a general view of the crowds which thronged
ip Broadway as Trudys car drove up Broadway to City Hall.  BE77926  Wide Worlc Photos

731251f-b.title: Celebrations - Parades - Municipal events - Welcome to Post and Gatty.
731251f-b.text:
Celebrations - Parades - Municipal Events: New Yorks welcome to
Wiley Post and Harold Gatty after their circumnavigation of the world
in 8 days. TThis motor cavalcade is on Broadway, progressing northward
to the City Hall, where Mayor James J. Walker will present gold medals
to each flier. The photographers vantage point is at Maiden Lane and
shows in 3 views the momentary heros passing that point. These "welcomes"
were an outstanding feature of the Walker mayoralty.
July 3, 1931.

731280f-a.title: Celebrations - Parades - Municipal events - Sound Money Parade.
731280f-a.text:
Celebrations, Parades and Municipal Events:
The "Sound Money Parade" moving up Broadway over the
cobblestones and passing City Hall.
A reprint of this photo appeared in the New York Sun
of February 1, 1936.
November 1, 1896
International News Photos
